name: Frozen Yogurt - Froyo On The Go!
name_original: Frozen Yogurt - Froyo On The Go!
description:
Frozen Yogurt ✫ Froyo On The Go!

Decorate and customize your lovely own made dessert!! And when you have it looking and "tasting" just how you want!! Share it with your friends, or save it to your photoalbum for later!!



Free Version
4 Free Cups
4 Free Flavors
4 Free Toppings
4 Free Spoons
Eat your virtual froyo
Save to your photo album
Share with your friends!!
Customize and make your froyo look super yummy!!!

Full Version
25 Cups
10 Flavors
10 Toppings
10 Spoons
Eat your virtual froyo
Save to your photo album
Share with your friends!!
Customize and make your froyo look super yummy!!!
